module.name: ImageListCache
module.short: Implements a caching mechanism for TCustomImageList (TImageList) instances.

descr.p: imagelistcache.pas contains classes, types, and routines used to implement a cache for TCustomImageList instances. It is used mainly to cache image lists with the glyphs used on button controls.
This file is part of the Lazarus Component Library (LCL).

element.name: IImageCacheListener
element.short: Interface that cache user should have to listen for cache changes.

element.name: IImageCacheListener.CacheSetImageList
element.short: Sets the image list for the cache listener.

element.name: IImageCacheListener.CacheSetImageList.AImageList
element.short: TCustomImageList instance for the listener.

element.name: IImageCacheListener.CacheSetImageIndex
element.short: Sets the new image index for an image in the list.

element.name: IImageCacheListener.CacheSetImageIndex.AIndex
element.short: Old image index in the listener.

element.name: IImageCacheListener.CacheSetImageIndex.AImageIndex
element.short: New image index in the listener.

element.name: TImageCacheItem
element.short: Represents an item in the cache.

element.name: TImageCacheItem.FImageList
element.short: Reference to the image list.

element.name: TImageCacheItem.FListener
element.short: Reference to the listener interface.

element.name: TImageCacheItem.FImageIndexes
element.short: Indices in the image list that the listener has reserved.

element.name: PImageCacheItem
element.short: Pointer to a TImageCacheItem type.

element.name: TImageCacheItems
element.short: Implements a container for cached image lists.

descr.p: TImageCacheItems is a TList descendant which implements a container for cached image lists. It allows indexed access to the image lists in the container by their ordinal position. It also provides a method used to create the image list references stored in the container.
TImageCacheItems is used in the implementation of the TImageListCache class.

element.name: TImageCacheItems.Notify
element.short: Notifies observers when a value in the container has been changed.

element.name: TImageCacheItems.Notify.Ptr
element.short: Untyped Pointer to the value for the change notification.

element.name: TImageCacheItems.Notify.Action
element.short: Action for the notification (Add, Extract, Delete).

element.name: TImageCacheItems.GetNew
element.short: Allocates and stores a new image list reference in the container.

descr.p: GetNew is a PImageCacheItem function used to allocate and store a new reference to an image list in the container. GetNew calls New to allocate the storage needed for the return value. The Add method is called to append the reference to the storage for the container.

element.name: TImageCacheItems.GetNew.Result
element.short: Reference for an image list stored in the container.

element.name: TImageCacheItems.Items
element.short: Provides indexed access to image list references in the container.

descr.p: Items is an indexed PImageCacheItem property which provides access to an image list reference in the container by its ordinal position. Read and write access to the property value are redirected to methods in the ancestor.
Items is the default property for the container.

element.name: TImageCacheItems.Items.AIndex
element.short: Ordinal position in the container for the requested image list.

element.name: TImageListCache
element.short: Implements a caching mechanism for image lists.

descr.p: TImageListCache is a class which implements a caching mechanism for TCustomImageList instances. It is used primarily to cache image lists and images used for Glyphs in TButtonGlyph.
TImageListCache contains internal members that are used for the cache storage and cache listener interfaces. The RegisterBitmap method is used to initiate actions affecting the cache storage.

element.name: TImageListCache.CheckRebuildNeed
element.short: Determines if the cache storage needs to be rebuilt when the change threshold is exceeded.

element.name: TImageListCache.GetImageListFor
element.short: Gets a TCustomImageList instance with the specified image size.

element.name: TImageListCache.GetImageListFor.AWidth
element.short: Width for the images in the image list.

element.name: TImageListCache.GetImageListFor.AHeight
element.short: Height for the images in the image list.

element.name: TImageListCache.UnregisterBitmaps
element.short: Marks an image list and its images as unused for the specified cache listener.

element.name: TImageListCache.UnregisterBitmaps.AListener
element.short: Cache listener removed in the method.

element.name: TImageListCache.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Allocates resources needed for internal members in the class instance.

element.name: TImageListCache.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Frees resources allocated to internal members in the class instance, including any stored images requested by cache listeners.

element.name: TImageListCache.RegisterListener
element.short: Adds a listener for an image list stored in the cache.

descr.p: RegisterListener is a method used to add the specified cache listener in AListener to the internal list of listener interfaces. If AListener does not already exist in the list, it is added.
RegisterListener is called from the RegisterBitmap method.

element.name: TImageListCache.RegisterListener.Result
element.short: Position where the specified listener was stored in the internal list.

element.name: TImageListCache.RegisterListener.AListener
element.short: Listener interface added to the internal list.

element.name: TImageListCache.UnregisterListener
element.short: Removes the specified cache listener from the internal list.

descr.p: UnregisterListener is a method used to remove the specified cache listener from the internal list in the class instance. If AListener exists in the interface list, the UnregisterBitmaps method is called and the listener is removed from the list.
When the number of listeners in the list reaches 0, the TImageListCache singleton used for the image list cache is set to Nil.

element.name: TImageListCache.UnregisterListener.AListener
element.short: Cache listener removed from the list.

element.name: TImageListCache.RegisterBitmap
element.short: Adds the specified bitmap to the image list for a cache listener.

descr.p: RegisterBitmap is a method used to register use the image in ABitmap for the cache listener specified in AListener. RegisterBitmap ensures that the cache listener and an image list exist in the cache. The RegisterListener method is called is the listener is not found in the cache. If an image list does not already exist in the cache, a new cache item is allocated.

ABitmap can contain a "sliced" image, which has multiple adjacent images each using the height for the bitmap. The image list in the cache is configured to use the number of images indicated in the ABitmapCount argument. Each image has the same height and width.
The cache listener in AListener is notified if an action caused a change to the index positions used in the image list.

element.name: TImageListCache.RegisterBitmap.AListener
element.short: Interface for the cache listener for the bitmap.

element.name: TImageListCache.RegisterBitmap.ABitmap
element.short: Bitmap registered in the method.

element.name: TImageListCache.RegisterBitmap.ABitmapCount
element.short: Number of image "slices" in the bitmap.

element.name: TImageListCache.Rebuild
element.short: Rebuilds the cache storage.

descr.p: Removes unused image lists in the cache where the cache listener is no longer registered. Deletes any cached images no longer needed for a given cached image list. Notifies listeners of changes to cached image indexes.

element.name: GetImageListCache
element.short: Provides access to the TImageListCache singleton in the implementation.

element.name: GetImageListCache.Result
element.short: TImageListCache instance for the implementation.
